message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $11,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I could come down slightly to $11,000.  This would still be a great price considering the value you'll get from it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
